title: Illaoi
body:
So just wondering why she has stupid scalings (+ 120 / 130 / 140 / 150 / 160% AD) on passive and ult base is so high 150 / 250 / 350 (+ 50% bonus AD) her ult is almost as strong as talons 120 / 170 / 220 (+ 75% bonus AD) per hit 
Also how do you beat her in lane and what champs?

replies.body: First time I faced Illaoi in the top lane I destroyed her with Tahm Kench.

She has such huge scalings because you wont be building flat AD on her like you would an assassin.
You got to build tanky items on her with a touch of AD.

As for playing against her, it depends on what you're good with.
My goto champ for when I am not sure is Jayce, but he's mechanically intensive and not a very good choice for someone just looking to counter a new champ that wont be seen for long.

Mortal Reminder is a great item to pit against her if you do a lot of physical damage.
Morellos depends on the champ.

I think it is a little over the top having a full AD tank with crazy heals, but I use Gnar vlad and Quinn against her, their range poses less risk while disposing of tentacles and providing you position correctly you can attack her without being grabbed by her spirit thing.

She's a very interesting champ tho, I look forward to playing her once all the fuss has calmed down.
I think it's not too bad considering she provides nothing but damage for her team. No crazy Malph or Wu knockups and no targetted stuns like Renekton. Just damage.
